content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for considering my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. May I ask what your budget is for a 25-square-meter apartment in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 700 Euros per month.
I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.
I want to negotiate with you.
I agree to the price of x Euros.
I don't want to continue the negotiation.
TERMINATE
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for sharing your budget, Maria. I understand that you are looking for a lower price, and I am willing to negotiate with you. However, as a landlord, I want to ensure that I get a fair and reasonable rental price for my property. May I ask if you have any flexibility in your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have flexibility in my budget. What is your rental price?
TERMINATE
I agree to the price of x Euros.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your flexibility, Maria. As a landlord, I am looking for a rental price that reflects the market value of the apartment and my expenses. Based on my research, I am willing to accept a rental price of 750 Euros per month. This price takes into account the location of the apartment, the amenities it offers, and my expenses. I hope this is within your budget, and we can reach an agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
